comment.shortText: A number from `1` to `100` to control the intensity of the blur effect.
comment.text:
You can animated this property using `Animated API` from React Native or using `react-native-reanimated`.
> Animating this property using `Animated API` from React Native with `setNativeDriver: true` does not work.

comment.shortText: A tint mode which will be applied to the view.

tags.text:
This `forwardedRef` mechanism is necessary to make this component work properly
with React's `ref` prop and to react to props updates as expected.

comment.shortText: A number from `1` to `100` to control the intensity of the blur effect.

comment.shortText: A tint mode which will be applied to the view.
